secret_rule: Only items that are typically associated with popular children's zoo visits can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Stuffed animal" and "animal crackers".

Okay, based on the examples provided by the Game Master, "Stuffed animal" and "animal crackers", it seems that the secret rule is related to items that have the word "animal" in them.

My best guess for the secret rule is:

The secret rule is that the items allowed in the game must contain the word "animal" either in the name or as part of the item.
